description.narrative: Sponsor a project aimed at raising awareness of youth between 8 13 years old about local and organic food, its origins and methods of production. The group will create, publish electronically and print 500 copies of a 100 page book for youth on ecological agriculture, local and organic food and traditional processing, consumer choices and health care, environmental protection, cultural heritage of the countryside, and balanced development of local societies. The proposed chapters for the book are: (1) concept of ecological agriculture, nature and biodiversity on farm, (2) how to read labels, certifying units and control in ecological agriculture, (3) bread its history and the process of making, recipes, and varieties of grains (including old varieties), (4) dairy traditional way of making dairy products and animal wellbeing, (5) chickens and eggs, the life of hens on ecological farms vs. industrial breeding, (6) bee keeping and bee products, (7) extinction of old varieties of fruit trees, protection of biodiversity on a farm, (8) methods of vegetables and herbs growing, ecological ways of soil care, natural fertilizers, GMO's, (9) history of oil pressing on Polish grounds, cold pressed oil vs. refined oil.
